long_description: The Delta Cycle iPhone Caddy features a wide platform to fit your iPhone 3Gs, 4 , 4s, 5 and 5s, and it offers easy viewing when you're riding. It comes with a water-resistant bag. Plastic construction stands up to wear and tear, rubber bumpers grip and cushion device, and water-resistant bag protects your smartphone from splashes and rain. Have a case? The iPhone Smartphone Caddy can hold an iPhone with case up to 2.7 x 5.5 x 0.625 in. Includes handlebar and stem mounts; felt bumpers are included to customize the fit between various phones and cases. Viewing angle can be set to your preference. Please note: the Delta Cycle iPhone Caddy has a suggested use with road or commuter bicycles.
short_description: The Delta Cycle iPhone Caddy features a wide platform to fit your iPhone 3Gs, 4 , 4s, 5 and 5s, and it offers easy viewing when you're riding. It comes with a water-resistant bag.
